<<<<<<< HEAD
The wicked petition, or, Israel's sinfulness in asking a king explain'd in a sermon at the assizes held at Northampton, March the 1st, 1680/1 / by Fr. Giffard. Giffard, Francis.
[4], 31 p.
Printed for Tho. Dring ..., London : 1681.
Perhaps by the Francis Giffard who was incorporated M.A. at Oxford 1660 cf. Anthony Wood. Fasti Oxonienses. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======
